summary: An Ordinance approving the amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1974 for the improvement of Spokane Street and West Spokane Street, from First Avenue South to Arizona Avenue and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by piling and planking the same, under Ordinance No. 20379, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
